snippet.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World - Release Trailer [Europe]
snippet.description:
Have a look at Scott Pilgrim's epic trailer of epic epicness! ... And be prepared for some serious beat'em up action...

Scott Pilgrim vs. The World : The Game is the ROCK-N-ROLL ACTION LOVE-STORY for the 8-BIT GENERATION.
